script: The project aims to develop the world's most innovative AI-powered educational content transformation platform, focusing on creating engaging and personalized learning experiences through various modalities including podcasts, videos, interactive presentations, and intelligent guidance. Key features include: 1. Enhanced Feature Set: - Core Transformation Features: The platform offers a Smart Video Processing Suite for converting long-form video content into shorter formats like TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Instagram Reels, optimizing engagement through AI-driven scene detection and emotional tone analysis. It also includes an Advanced Podcast Generation feature that supports single-voice narration with 20 voice options and multi-voice conversational modes, enhancing user interaction. - Smart Document Processing: This component enables intelligent summarization of documents, generating key concept mind maps, and creating interactive quizzes. Additionally, it features an AI Learning Assistant ("Brain") designed to provide personalized learning paths, adaptive difficulty adjustments, and context-aware responses. 2. Technical Architecture: - The platform's technical architecture is built on a microservices approach with FastAPI as the core framework for high-performance async operations. Key technologies include FFmpeg for video manipulation, Coqui TTS for voice synthesis, and custom fine-tuned models for education-specific tasks. - The project roadmap outlines three phases: setting up foundational infrastructure in Phase 1 (Weeks 1-4), implementing primary transformation features in Phase 2 (Weeks 5-12), and developing advanced AI features in Phase 3 (Weeks 13-20).
